name: Minix Multicast IPC implementation
short_description:
MINIX currently supports kernel IPCs that allows a sender to send a message to a receiver. In this project, we develop 4 IPC system calls. 
1. multi_join
2. multi_send
3. multi_recv
3. multi_unjoin
